type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

products.name: Products
products.text_option_info: Fill in the name(s) of the option used as text swatch, phrases of different languages are separated by a comma (E.g. Size, Taille).
products.color_option_info: Fill in all the name(s) of the color option used in the store, phrases of different languages are separated by a comma. (E.g. Color, Colour, Couleur).
products.color_swatches_example: One 'color name:value' per line. Up to three colors can be used to show vertical stripes. E.g.: 'Red Blue Stripes:#e22#22e'
products.color_swatches_guide: To use an image for color swatch, [upload a PNG image](/admin/settings/files) with the file name matching the color name, and spaces replaced by hyphens. E.g. for 'Hot Pink', upload 'hot-pink.png'.

search_navigation.name: Search and Navigation

predictive_search_enabled.label: Enable product suggestions
predictive_search_enabled.info: Live search results. Not available in all languages.

search_navigation.full_width: Make breadcrumbs full width on desktop
search_navigation.full_width_mobile: Make breadcrumbs full width on mobile

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32 px

cart.name: Cart
cart.cart_upsell_note: Offer recommending products for shoppers based on what is in their shopping cart.
cart.product_infor: If you use a product metafield to add upsell products, leave this field blank.

show_cart_custom_field.label: Enable Custom field
show_cart_custom_field.info: "Field label" must be filled in to enable custom field.

cart_custom_field_pattern.label: Validation regex (Advanced)
cart_custom_field_pattern.info: For field validation purpose. Please avoid using it if you’re not familiar with Regex. For assistance with Regex or fixing issues that arise from it, please [contact our support](https://support.bsscommerce.com/support/tickets/new).

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Visible when cart drawer is empty

order_amount_freeshipping.label: Order amount for freeshipping
order_amount_freeshipping.note: Enter the rules for order amount(s) to qualify for freeshipping (one rule per line). Format instructions and examples are as follow:
order_amount_freeshipping.example_1: amount (100) for orders from any country and currency without individually defined amount.
order_amount_freeshipping.example_2: currency code:amount (USD:100) for orders from any country using USD without individually defined amount.
order_amount_freeshipping.example_3: country code:currency code:amount (US:USD:100) for any orders from the US with the currency USD.

min_days.label: Minimum day(s) of delivery
min_days.info: The minimum number of days needed to ship all orders. Use a semicolon to differentiate between shipping markets if needed (e.g. US:6;UK:3), or fill in one number to apply for all available markets.
min_days.note: To customize for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_min' and type 'Text'. [Learn more about creating metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields) or [contact our support](https://support.bsscommerce.com/support/tickets/new).

max_days.label: Maximum day(s) of delivery
max_days.info: The maximum number of days needed to ship all orders. Use a semicolon to differentiate between shipping markets if needed (e.g. US:6;UK:3), or fill in one number to apply for all available markets.
max_days.note: To customize for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_max' and type 'Text'. [Learn more about creating metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields) or [contact our support](https://support.bsscommerce.com/support/tickets/new).

estimate_shipping.name: Estimated shipping rates
estimate_shipping.text: Display the estimated shipping cost at minicart and cart page based on customer's address.

advanced.name: Advanced
advanced.custom_info: For support with handling custom code or fixing issues related to custom code, please [contact us](https://support.bsscommerce.com/support/tickets/new).

additional_head.label: HTML for <head> tag
additional_head.info: Used for any custom HTML code to apply site-wide. Placed at the bottom of the <head> tag on all theme pages, except for checkout page.

selected_preset.label: Selected preset
selected_preset.info: This automatically detects your theme style and keeps necessary data when switching between presets. DO NOT EDIT, or it might result in losing theme settings and media.

enable_rounded_corners.label: Enable rounded corner style
enable_rounded_corners.info: To change button style, go to Theme settings > Buttons. To change image style for some specific sections, go to the section settings and search for 'Enable rounded corner images'.

currency_format.name: Currency format
currency_format.info: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

animation.name: Animations
animation.disable_parallax_effect_info: Parallax effect used in: Slideshow, Promotion banner, Media with text, Collection banner, Map, Age Verification popup.
animation.disable_zoom_info: Image zoom-in animation used in: Product card images, Collection card images, Media gallery, Promotion grid, Promotion popup, Text columns with image.

paragraph.content: Ask your customers for consent to use cookies and process their data, as required by the European Union's ePrivacy Directive and General Data Protection Regulation. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/your-account/privacy/GDPR)

text_settings.label: Add a cookie banner to your store in Theme settings > Cookie banner

padding_full_width.label: Enable side padding
padding_full_width.info: Add left and right padding when section is full-width.

open_new_window.label: Open this link in a new window

icon.info_button_icon: Applies to 'Sliced with icon' animation type.
icon.custom_icon_info: For assistance with custom SVG code or fixing issues that arise from custom SVG code, please [contact our support](https://support.bsscommerce.com/support/tickets/new).
icon.label: Icon

text.heading: Heading
text.title: Title
text.show_headng_as_h1_info: A page should only have one h1 tag for SEO purposes.

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: To show 4-level menu, leave this field blank
Choose a menu to apply for this menu item. Learn how to create a 4-level menu [here.](https://wiki.bsscommerce.com/docs/shopify-eurus-theme/user-guide/header/#main-menu)
menu.label: Menu

enable_carousel_on_desktop.label: Enable carousel on desktop
enable_carousel_on_desktop.info: Slider is the default mobile layout.

change_bar_every.label: Change bar every
change_bar_every.info: Make sure Auto-switch bar is on.

schedule_start_time.content: Set up exact time to start the countdown on the announcement bar.

schedule_end_time.content: Set up exact time to stop the countdown on the announcement bar.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

image_padding.label: Use original image ratio
image_padding.info: Select if you don't want your image to be cropped.

header_video_url.label: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

email.name: Email
email.info: Email is always required to submit the form.

options.label: Options
options.info: Input values of dropdowns, radio buttons and checkboxes. Options are separated by a simicolon (Ex: Client;Partner;Retailer;Wholesaler)

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

image_alignment.label: Desktop image alignment
image_alignment.info: Image is always on top on mobile.

block_author_note.label: Author's note
block_author_note.info: Used to show author's address, order or characteristics.

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)

image_ratio.info: Do not apply to overlay text style.

label_quickview.label: Quick view button label
label_quickview.info: "Quick view" will be used as default

settings.paragraph__1: Show more details about the product's vendor by selecting a page to show page's content in a popup without leaving the current site, or filling in a URL to direct to an external link.
settings.paragraph__2: To customize for each product, create product metafields and add them to the theme via [dynamic sources](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/displaying-metafields-on-your-online-store#theme-editor-metafields). For page, the metafield must be in type 'Page'. For link, the metafield must be in type "URL", with any customized key. [Learn more about creating metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields) or [contact our support](https://support.bsscommerce.com/support/tickets/new).
settings.paragraph__3: If both are available, the popup with the page's content will be shown.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

pickup_availability.label: Enable pickup availability feature
pickup_availability.info: Learn how to setup this feature [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup)

options__3.label: When product is out of stock

preorder_show.label: Enable
preorder_show.info: If 'When product is out of stock' option is selected, please make sure 'Continue selling when out of stock' is enabled in Shopify admin > Product detail page.

preorder_message.label: Message
preorder_message.info: Message will show under Pre-order button to provide more information about the item.

preorder_show_dynamic_button.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons for pre-orders

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products

estimate_delivery.name: Estimate delivery time
estimate_delivery.paragraph: To customize message for each product, create a metafield with the key 'custom.delivery_date_message ' and type 'Rich text'. Learn more about creating metafields.

message.label: Message
message.info__1: You can use these codes in the message:
message.info__2: earliest_delivery_date to show earliest delivery date.
message.info__3: latest_delivery_date to show latest delivery date.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)

show_thumbnails.label: Show product media thumbnails
show_thumbnails.info: Only applies in case of multiple product images.

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Video will be muted when autoplay is on.

hide_other_variant.label: Hide other variants' media after selecting a variant

show_tax_and_shipping.label: Show tax status and shipping policy

hide_variants.label: Hide unselected variants’ media on desktop

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

header_follow_on_shop.info: Display follow button for your storefront on the Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

settings.info: Choose a menu to apply for this menu item. Learn how to create a 4-level menu [here.](https://wiki.bsscommerce.com/docs/shopify-eurus-theme/user-guide/header)

show_first_image_product.label: Auto-fill collection images with first product image

settings.info: Choose a menu to apply for this menu item. Learn how to create a 4-level menu [here.](https://wiki.bsscommerce.com/docs/shopify-eurus-theme/user-guide/header)

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: To show 4-level menu, leave this field blank

menu_type_desktop.label: Desktop menu type
menu_type_desktop.info: Menu type is automatically optimized for mobile.

sticky_header_type.label: Sticky header
sticky_header_type.info: Keep header sticky on top of the page as customers scroll down.

show_hero.label: Used as Hero
show_hero.info: Enable if this section is used as hero, disable if not.

desktop_height.label: Desktop height
desktop_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

button_label.label: First button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

countdown.name: Countdown timer
countdown.content: Add a countdown timer to instill a sense of urgency among your customers and encourages them to buy a product.

desktop_image_width.label: Desktop image width
desktop_image_width.info: Image is automatically optimized for mobile.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

full_width_banner.label: Make banner full width on desktop

full_width_banner_mobile.label: Make banner full width on mobile

post_per_page.label: Post per page
post_per_page.info: Add options for customers to choose the maximum number of posts shown on one page. Only intergers larger than 0 are counted as valid, and options must be separated by a semicolon (e.g. 5;10;20;30).

note_per_page.info: Note: Options larger than 20 items per page is not recommended for performance optimization purpose.

paragraph.content: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

paragraph.content: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

products_per_page.label: Products per page
products_per_page.info: Add options for customers to choose the maximum number of products shown on one page. Only intergers larger than 0 are counted as valid, and options must be separated by a semicolon (e.g. 5;10;20;30).

per_page_note.info: Note: Options larger than 30 items per page is not recommended for performance optimization purpose.

filter_type.label: Desktop filter layout
filter_type.info: Drawer is the default mobile layout.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-grid-section-settings)

enable_quick_buy.label: Enable quick add button
enable_quick_buy.info: Optimal with popup or drawer cart type.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Only applied when all collections are shown.

image_ratio.label: Image style
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

show_heading.label: Show the default page heading
show_heading.info: If hidden, you should provide a h1 heading using the section heading for SEO purposes.

number_product_per_page.label: Number of products per page
number_product_per_page.info: Only applies when carousel is enabled.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Let customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

pickup_availability.label: Enable pickup availability
pickup_availability.info: Learn how to setup this feature [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)

desktop_media_layout.label: Desktop media layout
desktop_media_layout.info: Mobile media layout is automatically adjusted to fit the screen.

hide_variants.label: Hide other variants’ media after selecting a variant

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#search-results-section-settings)

change_bar_every.label: Change bar every
change_bar_every.info: Make sure Auto-switch logo is on.

columns_desktop.label: Number of columns
columns_desktop.info: If left 0, the number of columns on each row is automatically adjusted based on the original width of the logo images.

columns_mobile.label: Number of columns
columns_mobile.info: If Auto is selected, the number of columns on each row is automatically adjusted based on the original width of the logo images.

image_ratio.info: Not applicaple when Number of columns equals 0.

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)
Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/themes/development/recommended-products)

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-recommendations-section-settings)

paragraph.content: Section is hidden if there's no products viewed yet.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-recommendations-section-settings)

desktop_content_position.label: Desktop content position
desktop_content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

button_label_1.label: First button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

autoplay.label: Auto-play
autoplay.info: Auto-play is always on when text is added.

header_video_url.label: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your cover image to be cropped.

header_video_url.label: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

show_hero.label: Used as Hero
show_hero.info: Enable if this section is used as hero, disable if not.

store_address.label: Store address
store_address.info: Google Map will find the exact location

image.label: Image
image.info: Use when store address is left blank.

settings.introduce: Use this section to add labels and badges to your products and product cards. [See tutorials](https://wiki.bsscommerce.com/docs/shopify-eurus-theme/user-guide/product-badges-and-labels/)

sale-label.name: Sale label
sale-label.introduce: Sale label automatically displays on all discounted products.

content.info: use {sale} for discount percentage, {sale_amount} for discount amount.

sold-out-label.name: Sold out label
sold-out-label.introduce: Sold out label automatically displays on all unavailable products.

content.info: Use {inventory} for "In stock/Sold out", {quantity} for total quantity in inventory.

show_on_product_page.label: Show on product page
show_on_product_page.info: To show labels and badges in Quick view and Product Information, please add the 'Labels and badges' block in those sections, or check [this guide.](https://wiki.bsscommerce.com/docs/shopify-eurus-theme/user-guide/product-badges-and-labels/#note)

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: Icon will show in front of label text.

content.label: Content
content.info__1: You can use these codes in the content:
content.info__5: {count_down} for count down timer to end date. (Must enable schedule)

schedule_introduce.content: Set up to show labels on start time and hide on end time.

schedule_start_time.content: Set up exact time to start showing labels and badges.

schedule_end_time.content: Set up exact time to stop showing labels and badges.

show_on_mobile.label: Show on mobile
show_on_mobile.info: For better website accessibility, we recommend that only one popup should be shown on mobile devices.

delay.label: Delay
delay.info: Delay is disabled in theme editor for editing purposes.

reappear-after.label: Reappear after
reappear-after.info: The number of days before a dismissed popup reappears.

schedule_enabled.label: Enable schedule
schedule_enabled.info: Set up start and end date in the 'Countdown timer' block to show popup on schedule.

position_vertical.label: Message vertical position
position_vertical.info: Adjust the position of the sticky message on the screen side border

schedule_start_time.content: Setup the exact time to start countdown timer and show the popup on the storefront.

schedule_end_time.content: Setup the exact time to end countdown timer and hide the popup on the storefront.

text.label: Text
text.info: Use coupon_code to show the coupon code within the text box.

enable.label: Enable
enable.info: Popup will automatically be displayed in theme editor.

reappear-after.label: Reappear after
reappear-after.info: The number of days before a dismissed popup reappears.

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Video will be muted when autoplay is on.

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Video will be muted when autoplay is on.

show_end_date.label: This event has an end date
